features: Vanity Fair Everyday disposable paper napkins feature a smooth, cloth-like texture
New packaging with the same great cloth-like napkins you know and love
Casual 2-ply paper napkins add a classic, stylish look to your table
High-quality napkins are embossed with our signature Shell Design Ideal for everyday meals, snacking, casual parties, and family events
SFI is a registered trademark owned by the Sustainable Forestry Initiative, Inc. www.sfiprogram.org
Each pack includes 100, 6.5”x 6.35” folded (13”x 12.7” unfolded) disposable paper napkins in Classic White
body.description: Featuring a smooth, cloth-like texture and a fashionable design embossed with our signature flair, Vanity Fair® Everyday Paper Napkins look stylish at breakfast, lunch, dinner, or any time in between. We’ve redesigned our packaging, but inside, you’ll find the same premium 2-ply paper napkins you know and love. Each napkin comes with our classic design and subtle embossed pattern to make every meal feel a little more special. These napkins look elegant paired with your everyday dinnerware or flatware or arranged in a napkin dispenser on your table or countertop. Ideal for everyday family meals, picnics or hosting a party, these durable, absorbent yet soft napkins are perfect for setting the table on any occasion. You’ll love the comfort of cleaning your hands and face with the soft texture of our premium napkins. Each Vanity Fair® Everyday 2-ply dinner napkin is absorbent and smooth to the touch, with a texture and look that’s similar to cloth napkins. You can feel good about choosing Vanity Fair® napkins too. These paper napkins are made from trees we work with our suppliers to replenish and our sourcing practices are certified to the Sustainable Forestry Initiative® Fiber Sourcing Standard (SFI-00007). The 100 count pack ensures that you stay stocked up with plenty of napkins on hand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vanity Fair Everyday Casual Paper Napkins Add elegance to breakfast and make dinnertime a little more stylish with quality Vanity Fair Everyday casual paper napkins. These 2-ply, cloth-like napkins have a smooth texture and our signature embossed Shell Design that makes them a little more elegant and special than store brand napkins (or even paper towels). Vanity Fair Everyday casual paper napkins are a great choice for family meals, snacking, lunch boxes, casual parties, and picnics. Stock up today! • Casual paper napkins with smooth, cloth-like texture • 2-ply napkins embossed with Shell Design • For everyday meals, casual parties, snacking • Napkins measure 13”x 12.7” unfolded

Casual Napkins for Everyday Use Versatile Use Vanity Fair Everyday napkins to dress up your table or grab one for a quick snack. They are the perfect complement to all your everyday meals. Soft & Strong These high-quality, 2-ply napkins provide premium softness and strength with a cloth-like texture. Stylish Look Our classic shell emboss design gives our napkins a timeless, attractive appearance that adds a special touch to everyday meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The napkins are nice, and do the job well. I just think they are a little thin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used to buy less priced napkins, but I bought some of these somewhere else for the first time, and really like them. I run out, so I bought these recently to use, convenient to come to my door. These are nice size napkins, strong, soft and great to wipe your hands and face on. Soft enough to blow my nose too, which isn't an all the time thing. Most definitely I would purchase again. Only thing I wanted to purchase more than 4 packs, and they must limit you to 4 packs only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First time I tried this napkin, I knew I would stick to it for many years.Nice napkins!! Will buy it again. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and appearance
reviews.reviewText: I like everything about this product. I can't find it in my local stores anymore, and it was definitely worth seeking it out. It looks good on my table for guests, and it holds up well. Also a good buy for the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only napkins my husband likes
reviews.reviewText: These are the only napkins my husband likes me to buy. They are much softer and larger than other paper napkins. Personally, I don't care when kind of napkin I use but if it keeps the man happy I'll keep buying these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They are super absorbent and soft. What I look for in a good napkin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Better quality than some other brands.
